author: UnCreateds
txt_content:
Buider组：玩家xxx进入了游戏
VIP1: 会员XX进入了游戏
有没有插件可以实现..
谢谢

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
UnCreateds 发表于 2020-6-8 18:47
好像蛮复杂的样子,.,
我如果需要VIP1权限组进入游戏需要添加什么呢deluxejoin_formats:
  default:
    priority: 1
    join_actions:
    - '[JSONBROADCAST] {"text":"[","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"+","color":"green","bold":"true"}&&{"text":"]","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"  %player%","color":"gray","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"
      在线人数: &f%online%","color":"aqua"}]}}}'
    leave_actions:
    - '[JSONBROADCAST] {"text":"[","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"-","color":"red","bold":"true"}&&{"text":"]","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"  %player%","color":"gray","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"
      在线人数: &f%online%","color":"aqua"}]}}}'复制代码
关注这一段就行了
join_actions就是玩家加入执行的操作
然后这个是default组的
你可以把这一整段复制一遍
然后把default改成别的 比如vip1
那么只有拥有deluxejoin.fomat.vip1权限的玩家才会触发这个入服信息
举个例子
deluxejoin_formats:
  default:
    priority: 1
    join_actions:
    - '[JSONBROADCAST] {"text":"[","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"+","color":"green","bold":"true"}&&{"text":"]","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"  普通玩家 %player% 加入了服务器","color":"gray","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"
      在线人数: &f%online%","color":"aqua"}]}}}'
    leave_actions:
    - '[JSONBROADCAST] {"text":"[","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"-","color":"red","bold":"true"}&&{"text":"]","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"  %player%","color":"gray","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"
      在线人数: &f%online%","color":"aqua"}]}}}'

  vip1:
    priority: 1
    join_actions:
    - '[JSONBROADCAST] {"text":"[","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"+","color":"green","bold":"true"}&&{"text":"]","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"  尊贵的VIP1玩家 %player% 加入了服务器","color":"gray","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"
      在线人数: &f%online%","color":"aqua"}]}}}'
    leave_actions:
    - '[JSONBROADCAST] {"text":"[","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"-","color":"red","bold":"true"}&&{"text":"]","color":"dark_gray"}&&{"text":"  %player%","color":"gray","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","value":{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"
      在线人数: &f%online%","color":"aqua"}]}}}'复制代码
